String.Source: I don't see this skeever you're talking about.
String.Dest: 你说的那个雪鼠我可一点都不知道。

String.Source: Except with my presence, it's strictly an all Orc settlement. Congratulations.
String.Dest: 如果我不在这儿的话，这里就是个只有兽人的定居点了。恭喜。

String.Source: Except with my presence, it's strictly an all Orc settlement. Congratulations.

String.Dest: 如果我不在这儿的话，这里就是个只有兽人的定居点了。恭喜。

String.Source: Tomorrow night it will rain apples. The day after, sweet rolls.
String.Dest: 明晚天上会下苹果，后天则是甜甜圈。

String.Source: You weren't alone?
String.Dest: 当时你不是一个人？

String.Source: I liked my version better.
String.Dest: 我还是更喜欢鹿肉。

String.Source: A dual-wielding troll will ride to Winterhold tomorrow on horseback.
String.Dest: 明天一头双持巨魔会骑马去冬堡 。

String.Source: No thanks. You may quote a verse if you wish.
String.Dest: 不用谢。如果愿意，你可以吟诵一段经文。

String.Source: No thanks. You may quote a verse if you wish.

String.Source: Except with my presence, it's strictly an all Breton settlement. Rejoice.
String.Dest: 如果我不在这儿的话，这里就是个只有布莱顿人的定居点了。真好。

String.Source: Except with my presence, it's strictly an all Breton settlement. Rejoice.

String.Source: Except with my presence, it's strictly an all Breton settlement. Rejoice.

String.Source: What are these refreshments you keep referring too?
String.Dest: 你总是提到的那些茶点究竟是什么？

String.Source: I want to ask some questions first.
String.Dest: 我想先问一些问题。

String.Source: How does that relate to drinks?
String.Dest: 这跟饮料有什么关系？

String.Source: How does that relate to drinks?
String.Dest: 这跟饮料有什么关系？

String.Source: How does that relate to drinks?
String.Dest: 这跟饮料有什么关系？

String.Source: Smoked? Inhaled? Are we talking about Skooma?
String.Dest: 吸入的？吞服的？我们说的是斯库玛吗？

String.Source: Smoked? Inhaled? Are we talking about Skooma?
String.Dest: 吸入的？吞服的？我们说的是斯库玛吗？

String.Source: Smoked? Inhaled? Are we talking about Skooma?
String.Dest: 吸入的？吞服的？我们说的是斯库玛吗？

String.Source: Smoked? Inhaled? Are we talking about Skooma?
String.Dest: 吸入的？吞服的？我们说的是斯库玛吗？

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: There's something odd about your diction. Not to mention you.
String.Dest: 你的发音有些奇怪。无意冒犯。

String.Source: There's something odd about your diction. Not to mention you.
String.Dest: 你的发音有些奇怪。无意冒犯。

String.Source: How will Skooma make me more creative?
String.Dest: 斯库玛会怎样让我更有创造力的呢？

String.Source: How will Skooma make me more creative?
String.Dest: 斯库玛会怎样让我更有创造力的呢？

String.Source: How will Skooma make me more creative?
String.Dest: 斯库玛会怎样让我更有创造力的呢？

String.Source: How will Skooma make me more creative?
String.Dest: 斯库玛会怎样让我更有创造力的呢？

String.Source: How will Skooma make me more creative?
String.Dest: 斯库玛会怎样让我更有创造力的呢？

String.Source: Quite a pitch. I almost believed you until I smelled the skooma on your breath.
String.Dest: 天衣无缝啊。我要是没闻到你呼出的斯库玛味差点就相信你了。

String.Source: Tell me about the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 给我说说《艾达诗歌集》的事吧。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Except my presence here changes that.
String.Dest: 希望我的出现能让其有所改变。

String.Source: Except my presence here changes that.
String.Dest: 希望我的出现能让其有所改变。

String.Source: Except my presence here changes that.
String.Dest: 希望我的出现能让其有所改变。

String.Source: Except my presence here changes that.
String.Dest: 希望我的出现能让其有所改变。

String.Source: The Bards of Solitude will find a way to turn poetry into a weapon.
String.Dest: 独孤城的诗人们总会找到把诗歌变成武器的方法的。

String.Source: The Bards of Solitude will find a way to turn poetry into a weapon.
String.Dest: 独孤城的诗人们总会找到把诗歌变成武器的方法的。

String.Source: I am sure his reaction will be mixed when I inform him of the news.
String.Dest: 我很确定等我通知他这个消息时，他的反应一定会很错乱。

String.Source: I ask you, traveler, when is the last time the impossible stumbled across your mind?
String.Dest: 我问你，旅行者，你上一次脑袋里闪过“这不可能”的念头是什么时候了？

String.Source: While others hope for the improbable and dream the impossible, when your mind is cleansed of preconception, the impossible will dream of you.
String.Dest: 当别人在盼望着可能性、梦想着奇迹的时候，而你的头脑已经清除了偏见，那奇迹就会向你走来。

String.Source: Our most welcome guest has an acute sense of smell. Although my associate and I prefer the term refreshment, as it more accurately defines the drink.
String.Dest: 我们最受欢迎的客人有着敏锐的嗅觉。虽然我和我的小伙伴们喜欢叫它茶点，但是更准确地说，它应该被称为饮料。

String.Source: Has the guest already imbibed a refreshment? If not, the host is most impressed with the creativity you already possess.
String.Dest: 客人用过点心了么？如果没有的话，主持者将会对你早已拥有的创造力印象深刻。

String.Source: The word clean can be defined in a variety of ways. There is clean like the Karth River, and clean like the smell of a brisk summer breeze.
String.Dest: 干净这个词能被多样化的方式去诠释。就如同卡斯河一般纯净，就像夏日的微风一样清新舒爽。

String.Source: Correct. With two Orcs and one Breton, by rule I am technically an Orc. And Urzub is now a female.
String.Dest: 没错。和两个兽人与一个布莱顿人，就规定来说我是一个如假包换的兽人。而乌祖现在是女的了。

String.Source: The bauble, you see, was not a bauble. It was an amulet of articulation.
String.Dest: 这个小玩意儿，你也看到了，这可不简单呢。这是用来帮我发音的护身符。

String.Source: I wonder how Urzub will take the news. His figure is not well suited for a dress.
String.Dest: 我惊讶乌祖将怎么得到这消息，他可不适合做这种细心活。

String.Source: The refreshments we have gathered, on the other hand, seek to clean the surface of the mind.
String.Dest: 我们把茶点聚集在一起，换句话说，设法清理出位置来。

String.Source: I am but an erstwhile savage, who only but recently gained her powers of articulation.
String.Dest: 我以前根本就是个野人，连说话发音都是最近才学会的。

String.Source: He seemed to have died from a fracture of the skull, and his lifeless body was nestled comfortably beside the very rock that pinned my leg.
String.Dest: 他似乎已经因颅骨破裂而死了。他那毫无生气的身子软瘫在石头上，压着我的腿。

String.Source: As our most welcome guest, it is not my place to disagree. I hope my next rendition will be more to your liking.
String.Dest: 既然您是我们最为尊贵的嘉宾，那我就不跟您争论了。但愿我的下一首曲子会对您的胃口。

String.Source: When did you last think of things that could not be thought, because the mind thought beyond what should be thought?
String.Dest: 你最后一次想到那些无法想象的事情是什么时候？而在这思想超越了你能想象的极限之后，你要怎么去想？

String.Source: Why, by cleansing our guest of all banality. Imagine every boring thought left stranded in your mind, washed away in a tide of concentrated joy.
String.Dest: 为什么，当然是因为我们清洗干净了客人所有的乏味感。想象一下你的脑海里本来全都是些无聊的念头，然后突然被一波喜悦的浪潮冲走时的感受吧。

String.Source: Our guest does realize that words are already a weapon of war, and that this scenario is not only probable, but likely.
String.Dest: 我们的客人都了解了，口令已成为了战争的武器，这种情况不仅仅是有可能，而且是很有可能。

String.Source: Although indubitably, you were directed to this camp not by its countenance, but by its aroma, which is quite exquisite.
String.Dest: 但毋庸置疑，你会直直走向这个营地，不是因为它的外表，而且因为它强烈的香味儿。

String.Source: Then I noticed his right hand seemed to glimmer like a bauble. Which makes sense, as he was clutching one.
String.Dest: 然后我注意到他的右手似乎如同珠宝一般发出微微光芒。这是有道理的，因为他手里正攥着一个。

String.Source: Certainly, I hope that my recital does this piece justice. Ahem.
String.Dest: 当然，我希望能在音乐会上演奏好这首曲子。嗯哼。

String.Source: True. With two Bretons and one Orc, our status as an Orc Stronghold has now been revoked. We are now a fiefdom. And evidently, an all male one.
String.Dest: 正是这样，我们作为兽人据点的地方现在已被两个布莱顿人和一个兽人摧毁了。我们现在是在一块封地上，而且很明显这儿的人都是男的！

String.Source: An excellent rendition! You are truly a bard worthy of passing on the tradition of the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 表演得真棒！你是个真正的吟游诗人，有资格将艾达诗歌集的传统传承下去。

String.Source: As host to our most honored guest, I humbly apologize for my oratory failings.
String.Dest: 作为主持者，我为自己的口误，向我们尊敬的来宾表示最诚挚的歉意。

String.Source: Verily. It seems this settlement is now completely without race, but instead one based on gender. With your presence, we are now an all female tribe.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问。这个定居点的住民似乎完全无关种族，单单与性别有关。欢迎你，我们的部落成员现在全是女性。

String.Source: One might say clean refreshment and clean taste come when a drink washes smoothly over the surface of your tongue.
String.Dest: 有人说当一杯酒滑过你的舌头时你会感到身心轻松，余味悠远。

String.Source: Urzub and I prefer not to use that term, as it is most derogatory. We prefer the term refreshment.
String.Dest: 乌祖和我不怎么喜欢用这个词，因为它太尖刻了。我们更喜欢称其为“茶点”。

String.Source: No, for laying in the rock beside me was a skeletal fellow, more bones than skin, and more clothes than bone.
String.Dest: 不，是给我身边这位躺在石头上的骷髅兄弟，身上的骨头比肉皮多，衣服又比骨头还多。

String.Source: And so ends the story of Crantius the liar; a deviant and a scoundrel whom we commit to the fire.
String.Dest: 那么结束骗子克兰蒂乌斯的故事吧；一个叛经离道，一个我们想把他投进火里的人的故事吧。

String.Source: Perhaps you will critique my own reciting of a similar creation verse. Ahem.
String.Dest: 搞不好你会讽刺我用如此相像的诗句来描述。呃哼。

String.Source: It can be imbibed or inhaled, smoked or suckled, but the result is the same. Crystal clarity.
String.Dest: 它可以被饮入或吞服，吸入或喝下，但结果是一样的。像水晶一样清晰明了。

String.Source: Now when I say clean, I hope that I am not misrepresenting the potency of our drink, as I am referring to a very specific type of clean.
String.Dest: 现在当我说清除的时候，我希望不会被错误理解为多喝几杯，我指的是一种特殊方式的清除。

String.Source: There, one can inquire about everything from the meaning of life to the time of day.
String.Dest: 从那里，你可以探寻到一切事情。上至生命的意义，下到一天的时间。

String.Source: However, it will do us no good without the proper refreshments to balance it.
String.Dest: 不过呢，要是没有点合适的提神物平衡一下的话，那对我们一点好处都没有了。

String.Source: For it's death and emptiness who in the end is the true father of all; and when we leave this mortal coil it's to Sithis that we return.
String.Dest: 为此最终的死亡和虚无才是一切起源；并且当我们舍弃一切尘世的牵挂时，我们才能回归西帝斯的怀抱。

String.Source: For the inquisitive mind, this can lead to entirely new avenues of creativity to explore.
String.Dest: 对于有好奇心的人，这将带领他们探索到全新的创意之路上来。

String.Source: There is clean like the white of a freshly washed tunic, or clean like the inside of a recently scrubbed cauldron.
String.Dest: 这干净得像刚刚洗过的束腰外衣的那种白色，或者说像刚擦洗过的大锅的里面。

String.Source: This is delightful news. Perhaps I too can now evacuate myself in the river as opposed to the shrubs.
String.Dest: 真是个好消息。也许我也该马上躲进河里而不是钻进灌木丛去。

String.Source: In the time between this sentence and the last, I have witnessed two such fantastical events.
String.Dest: 就在这前后两句话的短短一瞬间，我就亲眼见证了两个奇迹的发生。

String.Source: I am not sure Urzub will be entirely thrilled to hear this. He is wont to scratch himself in locations that do not befit a lady.
String.Dest: 我不清楚乌祖听到这个会不会很高兴。他总是习惯做出不符合淑女的举动，比如使劲挠自个儿。

String.Source: After all, there is nothing negative about drinking a potion that allows you to stare into the face of the Divines.
String.Dest: 归根结底，喝这药水总不会有把你送去见圣灵那样的危险的。

String.Source: Forgive my rudeness, but if you will allow me to recite a similar verse, I would be most pleased. As our guest, you may judge its worthiness.
String.Dest: 原谅我的失礼，但如果你能容许我咏诵类似的一小节，我会非常满足。作为我们的贵客，你可以裁量它的价值。

String.Source: An admirable try, but this host recommends you imbibe some refreshments before proceeding any further.
String.Dest: 值得赞赏的猜想，但这位主持者建议你在深入讨论之前先喝点茶点。

String.Source: The wolf's fur was stripped, down to the last strand; and until the moons returned, he walked the earth as a mortal man.
String.Dest: 狼的毛皮剥除了，只剩小小一条；直到月光重新照亮夜空，他就像普通人一样游荡着。

String.Source: This host politely suggests you ingest three bottles of refreshment before attempting again.
String.Dest: 主持者会有礼有节地劝你三瓶茶点，然后可能还来。

String.Source: The Poetic Edda is part of the living history of Skyrim, first passed on orally and then through the written word.
String.Dest: 《艾达诗歌集》是天际一部分的活历史，最初是口耳相传，后来才出现抄本。

String.Source: Oh that was rather brilliant! Although traditionally in The Reach we prefer a slightly less grandiloquent reading of the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 哦太棒了！尽管在边陲领的传统中我们更习惯不这么夸张地朗诵艾达诗歌集。

String.Source: You jest, honored visitor. Its visage is clearly within your range of eyesight.
String.Dest: 你在逗我吧，尊敬的客人。它的脸就在你的目光所及处。

String.Source: Oh forgive my manners. I am erstwhile savage, who only recently gained her powers of articulation.
String.Dest: 哦，请原谅我的粗鲁。我以前是个野蛮人，最近才学会发音说话。

String.Source: When I first spoke to Urzub, I did not recognize the words, for they were none I had ever acquainted myself with before.
String.Dest: 我第一次跟乌祖说话时，并不是很能认得出那些词，因为我之前从没有了解过它们。

String.Source: Verily. It seems this settlement is now completely without race, but instead one based on gender. With your presence, we are now an all male tribe.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问。这个定居点的住民似乎完全无关种族，单单与性别有关。欢迎你，我们的部落成员现在全是男性。

String.Source: For our honored guest we have the cleanest refreshment this world has to offer, although I cannot speak for the next.
String.Dest: 我最后再说一遍，我们有这世上最干净的点心可以提供给我们尊贵的客人

String.Source: Whether it is a clean river, a clean towel, or a clean shave, the difference is in the surface.
String.Dest: 它可能是一条干净的河流，一条干净的毛巾，或是把胡子刮得干干净净的下巴，不同之处只在表面。

String.Source: I reached for the bauble just as Urzub reached for me. He forced me out of the river like a bear swatting a salmon.
String.Dest: 当我抓住那护身符的时候乌祖也正好抓住了我。他像熊在河里拍大马哈鱼一样把我撵上了岸。

String.Source: Meanwhile, Urzub, having witnessed my folly, rushed to the river to rescue me, but I could only stare pensively at the spindly corpse in the river.
String.Dest: 同时，乌祖，看到我做的蠢事，跑去河里救我，但我只能眼睁睁地盯着河里那具瘦长的尸体.

String.Source: True. With two Bretons and one Orc, our status as an Orc Stronghold has now been revoked. We are now a fiefdom. And evidently, an all female one.
String.Dest: 正是这样，我们作为兽人据点的地方现在已被两个布莱顿人和一个兽人摧毁了。我们现在是在一块封地上，而且很明显这儿的人都是女的！

String.Source: It's become apparent to me that all poetry is garbage.
String.Dest: 很显然对我来说所有的诗篇都是垃圾。

String.Source: It's become apparent to me that all poetry is garbage.
String.Dest: 很显然对我来说所有的诗篇都是垃圾。

String.Source: By what rule is this place an Orc Stronghold?
String.Dest: 这怎么会是个兽人要塞？

String.Source: By what rule is this place an Orc Stronghold?
String.Dest: 这怎么会是个兽人要塞？

String.Source: By what rule is this place an Orc Stronghold?
String.Dest: 这怎么会是个兽人要塞？

String.Source: By what rule is this place an Orc Stronghold?
String.Dest: 这怎么会是个兽人要塞？

String.Source: By what rule is this place an Orc Stronghold?
String.Dest: 这怎么会是个兽人要塞？

String.Source: Why did you leave the Forsworn?
String.Dest: 你为什么离开弃誓者？

String.Source: Why did you leave the Forsworn?
String.Dest: 你为什么离开弃誓者？

String.Source: Why did you leave the Forsworn?
String.Dest: 你为什么离开弃誓者？

String.Source: Why did you leave the Forsworn?
String.Dest: 你为什么离开弃誓者？

String.Source: It was an abysmal failure. Mogo's Mead will not go into production.
String.Dest: 莫格蜜酒不会投入生产，那是个彻底的失败品。

String.Source: What? I don't even know how to read.
String.Dest: 啥？我根本不知道怎么阅读。

String.Source: What? I don't even know how to read.
String.Dest: 啥？我根本不知道怎么阅读。

String.Source: Guards can be as corrupt as any thief.
String.Dest: 卫兵就像那些罪犯一样堕落。

String.Source: Guards can be as corrupt as any thief.
String.Dest: 卫兵就像那些罪犯一样堕落。

String.Source: You're eating rodents? I think I'll pass.
String.Dest: 你在吃老鼠？我想我还是免了。

String.Source: You're eating rodents? I think I'll pass.
String.Dest: 你在吃老鼠？我想我还是免了。

String.Source: You're eating rodents? I think I'll pass.
String.Dest: 你在吃老鼠？我想我还是免了。

String.Source: What do you do for a living?
String.Dest: 你是做什么工作的？

String.Source: What do you do for a living?
String.Dest: 你是做什么工作的？

String.Source: Why set up a camp here?
String.Dest: 我想先请教一些问题。为什么在这里建立了一个营地？

String.Source: Why set up a camp here?
String.Dest: 我想先请教一些问题。为什么在这里建立了一个营地？

String.Source: Why set up a camp here?
String.Dest: 我想先请教一些问题。为什么在这里建立了一个营地？

String.Source: Why set up a camp here?
String.Dest: 我想先请教一些问题。为什么在这里建立了一个营地？

String.Source: What's the future for Mogo's Mead?
String.Dest: 莫格蜜酒的前景怎样？

String.Source: What's the future for Mogo's Mead?
String.Dest: 莫格蜜酒的前景怎样？

String.Source: What's the future for Mogo's Mead?
String.Dest: 莫格蜜酒的前景怎样？

String.Source: That took a toll on my nerves. I could use a bottle to relax.
String.Dest: 那让我神经紧张。我得来一杯放松下。

String.Source: The party was fun. Vulwulf drank a lot of skooma.
String.Dest: 这场聚会很有意思。乌尔武夫磕了很多斯库玛。

String.Source: What do you mean? What events?
String.Dest: 你什么意思？发生了什么事？

String.Source: What do you mean? What events?
String.Dest: 你什么意思？发生了什么事？

String.Source: What do you mean? What events?
String.Dest: 你什么意思？发生了什么事？

String.Source: Certainly. I'd love to.
String.Dest: 当然，我很乐意。

String.Source: Certainly. I'd love to.
String.Dest: 当然，我很乐意。

String.Source: Skooma use can debilitate the mind and lead to crippling depression.
String.Dest: 嗑斯库玛会使人意志薄弱，导致严重的抑郁。

String.Source: Skooma use can debilitate the mind and lead to crippling depression.
String.Dest: 嗑斯库玛会使人意志薄弱，导致严重的抑郁。

String.Source: Skooma use can debilitate the mind and lead to crippling depression.
String.Dest: 嗑斯库玛会使人意志薄弱，导致严重的抑郁。

String.Source: Skooma use can debilitate the mind and lead to crippling depression.
String.Dest: 嗑斯库玛会使人意志薄弱，导致严重的抑郁。

String.Source: Tell me about the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 给我说说《艾达诗歌集》的事吧。

String.Source: Tell me about the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 给我说说《艾达诗歌集》的事吧。

String.Source: Tell me about the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 给我说说《艾达诗歌集》的事吧。

String.Source: So what happens then?
String.Dest: 那然后怎么样了？

String.Source: So what happens then?
String.Dest: 那然后怎么样了？

String.Source: So what happens then?
String.Dest: 那然后怎么样了？

String.Source: It was a borderline criminal activity and I won't do it again.
String.Dest: 那可是擦边犯罪的事儿，我可再也不干了。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: You were there. You tell me how it went.
String.Dest: 你当时也在那，你告诉我后来怎样了。

String.Source: This is the most pathetic Orc Stronghold I have ever seen.
String.Dest: 这简直是我见过最寒酸的兽人要塞了。

String.Source: This is the most pathetic Orc Stronghold I have ever seen.
String.Dest: 这简直是我见过最寒酸的兽人要塞了。

String.Source: A resounding success on all fronts then! For with Maven halting production, it will leave our business as the one true flavor of Mogo's Mead.
String.Dest: 伟大的成就就在眼前！如果玛雯停止生产的话, 我们就能出售醇正的莫格蜜酒了.

String.Source: Our guest is kind and well intentioned, and this humble host thanks her for her concern.
String.Dest: 我们的客人非常友善，鄙人感谢她的关心。

String.Source: It is my recommendation that our guest first take an account of the barrel by the tent, and our means of refreshment before rushing to judgment.
String.Dest: 我给客人的建议是，在匆忙下结论之前，先清点一下帐篷旁的木桶，和我们恢复精力的手段。

String.Source: The citizens of Less Khazgur will begin production immediately on bottles of Mogo's Mead, and distribute them throughout the Reach.
String.Dest: 一些卡兹古的居民将要开始生产一瓶又一瓶的莫格蜜酒，然后在整个要塞四处分发。

String.Source: You speak in haste, brave hero. For if the great whale chooses not to sell, then it is a victory nonetheless, as it leaves room for a new heir.
String.Dest: 你的口气听起來很急促呢，勇敢的英雄。如果巨头不打算出售，这仍然是个胜利，因为它为后人留下了空间。

String.Source: They say not a throat was dry that night. From the tavern to the Jarl's longhouse, palates were washed and minds were cleansed.
String.Dest: 那晚人们久旱逢甘霖。从酒馆到领主的长屋，每个人的喉咙都得到滋润，心灵也获得洗涤。

String.Source: They say not a throat was dry that night. From the tavern to the Jarl's longhouse, palates were washed and minds were cleansed.
String.Dest: 那晚人们久旱逢甘霖。从酒馆到领主的长屋，每个人的喉咙都得到滋润，心灵也获得洗涤。

String.Source: Perhaps our guest would like to give it a try? Simply clear your mind and envision one impossible thing.
String.Dest: 也许我们的客人想试试？只要你放空脑子，然后想象出一件不可能的东西。

String.Source: From the campfires of memorable days to the tavern halls of forgotten nights, the Poetic Edda is passed on and added to by each generation.
String.Dest: 篝火唤起那些难以忘怀的在蜜酒大厅的夜晚的记忆，世代交替，总有一些新的篇章被添加入这世代相传的诗歌集中。

String.Source: We are troubadours. Celebrators of life. We drink and feast from twilight to cock's crow, in tribute to tradition and song.
String.Dest: 我们是游吟诗人，生活的歌颂者。我们在宴会上畅饮，从黄昏到黎明，表达对传说和诗歌的崇高敬意。

String.Source: Of course, have as many as you wish. Refreshment will be had by all, now that Mogo's Mead will have a true heir.
String.Dest: 当然了，请随意享用。好吃好喝的大家一起来。现在莫格蜜酒可是后继有人啦。

String.Source: Oh forgive my manners, this host did not mean to presume. Perhaps then I will sanctify this meeting with my own reading from the Edda. Ahem.
String.Dest: 哦，原谅我的粗鲁吧。主持者不是故意如此放肆的。或许我现在应该用从艾达诗歌集里获得的灵感来为这一切写下注脚。嗯哼。

String.Source: As our guest, I cannot refute the legitimacy of your claim. I only ask that you have a refreshment and open your mind to hearing another verse.
String.Dest: 作为我们的客人，我不能否认你的要求十分合理。我只希望你能恢复精神，打开心扉，聆听另一首诗。

String.Source: Tidings, honored guest. My name is Beatrice. The raffish companion you see beside me goes by the name of Urzub.
String.Dest: 你好，尊敬的客人。我叫比阿特丽斯，我旁边这群无赖是乌祖的人。

String.Source: In this instance, the rules state we choose the next highest round number when making an estimate.
String.Dest: 在这个情况下，按规矩我们得选择下一个整数来做评估。

String.Source: Take my associate here, who when standing, is roughly two and a quarter sword lengths in height.
String.Dest: 把我那个站起来身高大约两又四分之一剑长的同事带过来。

String.Source: Skeever steak is known to be the Waughin Jarth of cooked meats, and their tails are a highly regarded delicacy in certain culinary circles.
String.Dest: 雪鼠肉排就如同肉食里的瓦辛·贾斯那样被众人所知，而他们尾巴的美味更是备受美食界的推崇。

String.Source: A disagreement over refreshments led to my departure. Verily, I was not alone in my thirst, for as I ventured north, another came south.
String.Dest: 茶点上的分歧导致了我的离开。真的，渴望茶点的不是我一个人。因此我来到了北方冒险，而另一个人去了南面。

String.Source: Why, the rule of estimation! If that is cause for confusion, allow this host to offer her guest an example.
String.Dest: 为什么？估计准则啊！如果这造成了困惑，请允许我举个例子解释一下。

String.Source: Our guest is kind and well intentioned, and this humble host thanks him for his concern.
String.Dest: 我们的客人善意而且和爱，谦卑的主持者表达了对客人关照的谢意。

String.Source: Our guest seems disappointed in the menu. My deepest apologies, for I had not anticipated such an outcome.
String.Dest: 我们的客人似乎对菜单很失望。我很抱歉，我没料到会是这样的结果。

String.Source: Now, suppose he were exactly two and a half sword lengths in height, why, his distance from the numbers two and three would be equal.
String.Dest: 现在，假设他有两个半把剑那么高，那为什么他和两把剑或三把剑的距离都相同呢。

String.Source: For your part in this ordeal, I offer this reward. A large sum of gold and a fortune in wisdom. Take it, and be cleansed.
String.Dest: 在经历了如此残酷的考验后，这是你应得的。一大笔黄金和智慧的财富。拿着吧，然后赶紧去清洗一番。

String.Source: If that is what the Gods will, then fear not, for you have already done more than is required. For now, the day of true refreshment is at hand!
String.Dest: 如果这就是神期望的，不要惧怕，你已经作了你能做的。现在，革命的日子要到来了

String.Source: That is a most peculiar accusation. Urzub can vouch that I was here the entire time, as I can vouch for him.
String.Dest: 那还真是个特殊的指控。乌祖能担保我整段时间都在这里，同样我也可以为他担保。

String.Source: In the curve of its eyes I saw the future, where the Septim had been replaced by pieces of cork as Tamriel's most commonly traded currency.
String.Dest: 从它微眯的双眼中，我看到了未来。软木取代了赛普汀，成为泰姆瑞尔大陆最常见的交易货币的未来。

String.Source: Not at all, friend, I would suggest your system of measurement is inherently flawed.
String.Dest: 完全不，朋友，我猜你的测量系统有“先天残疾”。

String.Source: The future is sparkling bright, for the great whale is no longer a detriment to our vision.
String.Dest: 未来在闪闪发光，因为眼下所有障碍都已被扫净。

String.Source: Perhaps our guest would prefer a beverage instead. Parched of throat or parched of mind, our drink will offer the remedy.
String.Dest: 也许我们的客人需要的是饮料。干燥的喉咙或干枯的心灵，我们的饮品均可有效缓解。

String.Source: And from the womb of that infinite revelry came a flash of inspiration, a paroxysm of melody and song.
String.Dest: 与生俱来的无限狂欢灵感一现，一阵旋律和歌曲骤然爆发。

String.Source: And from the womb of that infinite revelry came a flash of inspiration, a paroxysm of melody and song.
String.Dest: 与生俱来的无限狂欢灵感一现，一阵旋律和歌曲骤然爆发。

String.Source: Stupendous! Have you brought your own refreshments? Regardless, this host recommends you procure a bottle from the barrel adjacent to the tent.
String.Dest: 真了不起！你给自己带了点心？不论如何，主持者劝你从旁边帐篷的木桶里拿瓶酒。

String.Source: The choice falls onto you, humble traveler. If the Gods bless and the mood strikes, then by all means feel free to recite.
String.Dest: 选择权在你，谦卑的旅人。如果情怀在你胸中激荡，请无论如何尽情地朗诵吧。

String.Source: The host is quite aware of the stigma regarding our most treasured refreshment. And as of yet, it has not affected her lucidity.
String.Dest: 这里的主持者十分清楚，于我们而言最大的耻辱，就是我们都是甜点控。迄今为止，那并没有影响到她的清醒头脑。

String.Source: The host is quite aware of the stigma regarding our most treasured refreshment. And as of yet, it has not affected her lucidity.
String.Dest: 这里的主持者十分清楚，于我们而言最大的耻辱，就是我们都是甜点控。迄今为止，那并没有影响到她的清醒头脑。

String.Source: After all, as half the population is still Orc, by rule it still classifies as a Stronghold, more or less.
String.Dest: 毕竟，这里一半的人口还是兽人，就法规来说它仍然是个兽人要塞，不多不少刚刚好。

String.Source: Given that there are half as many Orcs and half as many Bretons, one might estimate that this settlement consists of all Orcs and all Bretons.
String.Dest: 鉴于这地方有一半儿兽人和一半儿布莱顿人，我可以推测，这地界儿的人口全是由兽人和布莱顿人组成的。

String.Source: For you see, I was once a member of the despicable clan of rogues and derelicts known as the Forsworn.
String.Dest: 你看，我曾经是一个卑劣的犯罪团伙的一员并且作为一个弃誓者被遗忘。

String.Source: The timing of your visit is rather impeccable. Urzub has just secured a fresh skeever which we hope to prepare at the top of the hour.
String.Dest: 你来得真是时候，乌祖在我们正想着准备午饭的时候抓到一只雪鼠。

String.Source: Why, there could be no other place! It has been chosen by serendipity itself.
String.Dest: 为什么，不可能再有其他地方了！它已经偶然地被选择了！

String.Source: Ah, our champion returns. What news do you have of the party? I take it all went splendid?
String.Dest: 哎呀，我们的大英雄回来啦。关于派对有什么新消息？我猜该办的都办妥了？

String.Source: We welcome you to join us in consumption of this delectable feast.
String.Dest: 欢迎你和我们一起来享用这美味而丰盛的饭菜。

String.Source: Our most treasured guest cannot intake a freshly prepared skeever without the plenary imbibing of a cold beverage.
String.Dest: 我们的最尊贵的客人在享用新鲜烹制的雪鼠时还应该满饮一杯冰饮料才行。

String.Source: As for myself, I ventured here from across the river, from a cave known as Druadach Redoubt.
String.Dest: 说到我自己，我是从河对面流浪到这儿的，从一个名叫逐达奇据点的洞里。

String.Source: Behind you I saw a bear dressed in Thalmor robes, trained to sniff out Talos worshippers. It followed the river back east.
String.Dest: 我从你身上看到了一头穿着梭默长袍的熊，训练有素地四处嗅着塔洛斯信徒的踪迹。然后沿着河向东追踪而去。

String.Source: The bottles we store at this camp represent a harking back to that day, to the true spirit of the bard's tune.
String.Dest: 我们保存在这个营地里的瓶子象征着那一天的回响，那里保存着吟游诗人曲子里的真正精神所在。

String.Source: The same rule applies to the composition of this settlement.
String.Dest: 同样的规律也适用于估计居民人口构成。

String.Source: All of this through the pageantry of song. And while as our guest, the honor of first verse is yours, I can fulfill this role in your stead.
String.Dest: 所有这些都贯穿于壮丽的歌篇，然而你，我们的客人，关于荣耀的第一个诗篇属于你，只要你高兴，我就能从这角色中得到满足。

String.Source: My associate Urzub was slaving in the mines of Mor Khazgur when a similar thirst afflicted him and sent him south to this location.
String.Dest: 我的伙伴乌祖曾经在莫卡兹古尔的矿井里被奴役，直到一种相似的渴望折磨着他，带着他南行到这里.

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Your presence makes our total attendance three, each of us drawn by our curiosity to this Dwarven obelisk.
String.Dest: 你的到来让我们凑齐了三个人。我们都是被矮人方尖碑所吸引而来到此地的。

String.Source: Yet if he were to insist that he was three sword lengths in height, you would find the estimation absurd. The nearest round number being two.
String.Dest: 但是如果他坚持说自己有三把剑接起来那么长，你就会发现尊重是一件多可笑的事。最近一圈的数字是二。

String.Source: What's with the Orc?
String.Dest: 那个兽人是怎么回事?

String.Source: What's with the Orc?
String.Dest: 那个兽人是怎么回事?

String.Source: What's with the Orc?
String.Dest: 那个兽人是怎么回事?

String.Source: I agree. Mogo's Mead would taste much better if it were skooma.
String.Dest: 深表同意。莫格蜜酒要是斯库玛，味道会好很多。

String.Source: I agree. Mogo's Mead would taste much better if it were skooma.
String.Dest: 深表同意。莫格蜜酒要是斯库玛，味道会好很多。

String.Source: Do the bards who sing Mogo's Mead know about this story?
String.Dest: 那些唱莫格蜜酒的诗人知道这个故事吗？

String.Source: Do the bards who sing Mogo's Mead know about this story?
String.Dest: 那些唱莫格蜜酒的诗人知道这个故事吗？

String.Source: Do the bards who sing Mogo's Mead know about this story?
String.Dest: 那些唱莫格蜜酒的诗人知道这个故事吗？

String.Source: Agreed. Something must be done to restore the dignity of Mogo's Mead.
String.Dest: 同意。必须做些什么来让莫格蜜酒重新变得高贵起来。

String.Source: Agreed. Something must be done to restore the dignity of Mogo's Mead.
String.Dest: 同意。必须做些什么来让莫格蜜酒重新变得高贵起来。

String.Source: Agreed. Something must be done to restore the dignity of Mogo's Mead.
String.Dest: 同意。必须做些什么来让莫格蜜酒重新变得高贵起来。

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: Wait, do they still brew Mogo's Mead in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 等等，你还在天际做莫格蜜酒吗？

String.Source: This is not the kind of behavior I approve of. I will pass.
String.Dest: 我并不认可这种行为，我放弃。

String.Source: Was that a bottle of Mogo's Mead I saw on your barrel?
String.Dest: 我没看走眼的话，好像有一瓶莫格蜜酒在你的桶里？

String.Source: Was that a bottle of Mogo's Mead I saw on your barrel?
String.Dest: 我没看走眼的话，好像有一瓶莫格蜜酒在你的桶里？

String.Source: Was that a bottle of Mogo's Mead I saw on your barrel?
String.Dest: 我没看走眼的话，好像有一瓶莫格蜜酒在你的桶里？

String.Source: Was that a bottle of Mogo's Mead I saw on your barrel?
String.Dest: 我没看走眼的话，好像有一瓶莫格蜜酒在你的桶里？

String.Source: Was that a bottle of Mogo's Mead I saw on your barrel?
String.Dest: 我没看走眼的话，好像有一瓶莫格蜜酒在你的桶里？

String.Source: Or you could just say "Two and a half." Using whole numbers isn't necessary.
String.Dest: 或者你可以说"2.5"。没必要用整数。

String.Source: Or you could just say "Two and a half." Using whole numbers isn't necessary.
String.Dest: 或者你可以说"2.5"。没必要用整数。

String.Source: That was brilliant. The Poetic Edda lives on.
String.Dest: 真是机智。艾达诗歌集将会长存。

String.Source: Guards can be as corrupt as any thief.
String.Dest: 卫兵就像那些罪犯一样堕落。

String.Source: Skooma is illegal to consume. I should have you arrested for glorifying it so.
String.Dest: 使用斯库玛是犯法的，你再宣传的话我就逮捕你。

String.Source: Skooma is illegal to consume. I should have you arrested for glorifying it so.
String.Dest: 使用斯库玛是犯法的，你再宣传的话我就逮捕你。

String.Source: Skooma is illegal to consume. I should have you arrested for glorifying it so.
String.Dest: 使用斯库玛是犯法的，你再宣传的话我就逮捕你。

String.Source: You clearly just made that story up.
String.Dest: 你很明显在编故事。

String.Source: You clearly just made that story up.
String.Dest: 你很明显在编故事。

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...

String.Source: So the song Mogo's Mead is really about skooma?
String.Dest: 这么说《莫格蜜酒》这首歌唱的其实是斯库玛？

String.Source: So the song Mogo's Mead is really about skooma?
String.Dest: 这么说《莫格蜜酒》这首歌唱的其实是斯库玛？

String.Source: So you want to turn the Black-Briar home into a skooma den? Sounds fun.
String.Dest: 你是打算把黑荆棘家房子变成斯库玛毒窝？有意思。

String.Source: So you want to turn the Black-Briar home into a skooma den? Sounds fun.
String.Dest: 你是打算把黑荆棘家房子变成斯库玛毒窝？有意思。

String.Source: So you want to turn the Black-Briar home into a skooma den? Sounds fun.

String.Source: So you want to turn the Black-Briar home into a skooma den? Sounds fun.
String.Dest: 你是打算把黑荆棘家房子变成斯库玛毒窝？有意思。

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: Where did you learn to articulate so well?
String.Dest: 你在哪儿学得发音如此清晰？

String.Source: That was...an interesting interpretation. Backwards, but interesting.
String.Dest: 那是一个...有趣的解释。落后，却很有趣。

String.Source: Thus your task is simple, for you need only replace the bottles. The refreshment will handle the rest.
String.Dest: 因此你的任务很简单，你只需要更换那个瓶子。那些茶点会处理接下来的事。

String.Source: The great whale Maven Black-Briar has swallowed barrel after brewery, and still her appetite is nothing short of rapacious.
String.Dest: 玛雯·黑荆棘已经鲸吞了酿酒厂后面的酒桶，但她贪婪的欲望尚未满足。

String.Source: It is not just the past, but the future that hangs in the balance. We honor not only history, but we inspire the poets and bards of the age to come.
String.Dest: 这不仅是过去，未来难料。我们的荣耀不仅是曾经，创造历史，让游吟诗人千古传诵的时代到来了！

String.Source: To do this, you must embark on a great quest, an epic that the bards will sing for all eternity!
String.Dest: 要做到这一点，我们必须踏上伟大的旅程，伟大的事迹将被永恒传诵！

String.Source: For one with humble origins such as I, one needs round numbers to count on her round fingers.
String.Dest: 对于我这种天资愚钝的人来讲，算数只能用手指，数的只能是整数。

String.Source: No polishing of spears or lifting of tails, no kneading of loaves did this courtship endure;
String.Dest: 没有被抛光的矛也没有翘起的尾巴，没有揉搓的面包让这爱情持久；

String.Source: Now go, henceforth to the Black-Briar Meadery! Go and champion the cause of enlightenment!
String.Dest: 从今以后就去黑荊棘蜜酒庄吧！来支持一下我们“因为专注所以专业”的事业吧！

String.Source: However, it seems you are one with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge. That is why only you can restore Mogo's Mead to its true glory.
String.Dest: 然而，似乎你是个对知识非常渴求的人。所以只有你能把莫格蜜酒的地位恢复到它的全盛时期。

String.Source: Unfortunately, he is far less loquacious than I, especially in the presence of new guests.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，他远没我那么唠叨，特别是有新客人在场时。

String.Source: This is why you, defender of the law, would make for the perfect champion for a great quest to restore Mogo's Mead to its true glory.
String.Dest: 这就是你作为一个拥护法律的人，会因为其名誉而极力支持修复莫戈蜂蜜酒厂的原因。

String.Source: That is why you must dive toward the depths of the Black-Briar Meadery, and remove the barnacles that dull the mind!
String.Dest: 这就是你必须自己迈入黑荆棘庄园的深渊，还得除去心理上的负担的原因！

String.Source: I foresee a great quest! A reckoning! With you at the center.
String.Dest: 我预见到一个重大的历史任务！一个计划！以你为中心。

String.Source: The northern wolf ruled the earth and roamed the dense forest; Tracking game and spilling blood all for Hircine's glory.
String.Dest: 北方之狼统治了这片土地，漫步于茂密的森林；追踪猎物以及杀戮全部是为了海尔辛的荣光。

String.Source: Crantius satisfied himself without dignity or remorse, from across the farm, the animals bayed in protest.
String.Dest: 克兰蒂乌斯毫无廉耻可言，他穿过农场，就连动物都会大声抗议 。

String.Source: Urzub is a fine host, and it is by virtue of his hunting skill that we are blessed with this current feast.
String.Dest: 乌祖是个好主人，正是凭借他出色的狩猎技能，我们才能享受现在这顿大餐。

String.Source: That may be true of someone with your education and intellectual vigor, but we common folk must really on estimates.
String.Dest: 也许对你们这些受过教育的聪明人来说是没错，可我们这些平头百姓只能靠蒙的了。

String.Source: So the champion denies his destiny, and dooms the world to darkness. I do hope you reconsider.
String.Dest: 于是勇士否定了他的命运，把世界陷入黑暗之中。我强烈要求你重新考虑下。

String.Source: However, the popularity of the bard's song has persisted, and now even the whale has conceded there is profit in another's brand name.
String.Dest: 然而，吟游诗人的诗歌所带来的热潮未曾消退过，而现在，甚至连业界大鳄都开始关注起这另一个品牌所带来的利益了。

String.Source: It hunted foxes, rabbits, chickens and all that it knew how; until the day it met the hawk perched up on a bough.
String.Dest: 它猎杀狐狸，兔子，鸡以及所有它知道如何猎杀的动物，直到某一天它看见了枝头上栖息着的鹰。

String.Source: The maid was not one of mortal form, for on sunlit days she grazed on the pasture.
String.Dest: 女仆不是凡人形象之一，在一个阳光明媚的日子里她在草原上放牧。

String.Source: Yet no sooner did I turn around that a great big dragon swept overhead, the force of which catapulted me into the water.
String.Dest: 还没等我转过身来那只巨大无比的龙就直接在我头顶上方挥了一下翅膀，那力道强得直接把我刮进了水里。

String.Source: I had recently absconded from Druadach Redoubt with two bottles of refreshment on my person when I arrived at the bank of the river.
String.Dest: 我曾经随身带着两瓶饮料从逐达奇据点逃了出来，我那时正好到了河边。

String.Source: They plan to replicate the original recipe, but alas not the recipe that inspired the song.
String.Dest: 他们打算复制原有的配方，但可惜的不是那个给曲子带来灵感的配方。

String.Source: The hawk mocked the wolf who lay exhausted from the chase; then swooped and stole the wolf's kill, leaving it in shame.
String.Dest: 老鹰嘲笑那追逐猎物疲惫不堪的狼；然后一个猛扑偷走了狼的猎物，留给它的只是耻辱。

String.Source: The wolf clenched its teeth and filled its heart with fearsome wrath; until it saw wisdom in the hawk's ventured path;
String.Dest: 狼紧咬牙齿内心充满了愤怒，直到它智慧的看到了雄鹰的冒险之路；

String.Source: However, the choice proved to be his downfall, for the guards, prone to acts of inebriation, quickly confiscated his wagon.
String.Dest: 然而，这个选择造成了他的垮台，因为那些嗜酒的卫兵迅速没收了他的马车。

String.Source: This travesty of justice must be rectified immediately, and that is the quest I would have you endure.
String.Dest: 这歪曲的公正必须得到纠正，这是你必须服从的命令。

String.Source: However, our guest may find that after a bottle of refreshment and some time by the campfire, the words flow faster than the Karth itself.
String.Dest: 尽管如此，我们的客人还是会在一些接触之后就了解的。言谈交流可比卡斯河水流得还快。

String.Source: The truth shocks you, as it should. However, your reactionary denial will soon transform to acceptance.
String.Dest: 想必真相会让你震惊的。不过，你出于守旧心理的反对情绪很快就会转变为欣然接受的。

String.Source: What we are doing is curing the masses of their ignorance. You will lift the fog that covers their minds through the imbibing of clean refreshment.
String.Dest: 我们所做的事就是矫正民众的愚昧。你喝掉一些干净的茶点更能教他们觉得云里雾里。

String.Source: It is with much regret I say "Doubtful," for the mead wars have claimed many in our time and times passed.
String.Dest: 我很遗憾我说了“有待商榷”，岁月流转，但在我们的时代中由蜜酒引发的战争却从没有消失过。

String.Source: For I speak of a grand quest, a romantic epic to return Mogo's Mead to its former glory.
String.Dest: 为了我提到的那个伟大的任务，让莫戈蜜酒地回复往日的荣耀的浪漫史诗。

String.Source: Ahem. O, Crantius, my spouse, my licentious betrayer, your legend is lies, lurid and false; your conquest of the maid, a con for the ages;
String.Dest: 嗯哼，哦，克兰蒂乌斯，我的另一半，我放荡的背叛者，你的传奇是谎言，苍白而虚伪；你征服了那个女仆，欺骗了一个时代。

String.Source: You have a meticulous eye, traveler. Yet to answer your query, I must first tell you a story.
String.Dest: 你眼睛还真尖，旅行者。但要回答你的问题，我先得讲一个故事。

String.Source: As our most timely and honored guest, it is not my place to disagree. Nor will I deny any other flatteries you wish to send my way.
String.Dest: 你是我们最尊贵的客人，我不该反对的。同样的我也不会拒绝你的任何奉承。

String.Source: There was once a peddler from Elsweyr, who sought to bring a barrel of the finest refreshments to his cousin in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 在艾斯维尔曾经有一个小贩，想给他那在天际的表亲带一桶最棒的新货。

String.Source: Undaunted, he sought to smuggle them inside bottles of a popular brand of mead, brewed by a local man named Mogo.
String.Dest: 他大胆地设法把它们藏在一种著名的蜂蜜酒瓶里，那种酒是一个叫莫戈的当地人酿的。

String.Source: Viewing the campfire in proximity of the Dwarven ruin, I attempted to cross the river, warily dipping my toes into the rushing current.
String.Dest: 近距离观察者矮人遗迹里的篝火，我试图趟过那条河，小心翼翼地把自己的脚尖探进湍急的水流中。

String.Source: Word has traveled to our ears of a party to test the idea of reintroducing Mogo's Mead to Skyrim, but under the whale's banner.
String.Dest: 我听说在天际，有一个目的在于向人们重新展示莫格蜜酒的宴会正在筹备，虽然那酒贴着业界巨鳄的牌子。

String.Source: If they are true students of history, they would. Alas, these days people confuse the erudite with the recondite, and the artful with the arcane.
String.Dest: 如果他们真的是历史系的学生，那么他们会的。哎呀，最近人们总是以为博学多才就是油嘴滑舌，有点伤神啊。

String.Source: It was rather embarrassing, although I took some consolation in the fact that I was not the first to drown in such an inglorious manner.
String.Dest: 真是尴尬啊，不过还好，听说我不是第一个被这种没品的事烦死的人

String.Source: The bottles we store at this camp represent a harking back to that day, to the true spirit of the bard's tune.
String.Dest: 我们保存在这个营地里的瓶子象征着那一天的回响，那里保存着吟游诗人曲子里的真正精神所在。

String.Source: Surely you know the difference between the laws of man and the laws of the Divines? If a Jarl were to outlaw breath, would you adhere to it?
String.Dest: 你知道人的法律和圣灵的法律之间的区别吗？如果一个领主宣布呼吸是违法的，你能遵循吗？

String.Source: Unfortunately, those who governed the Empire frowned upon the imbibing of clean, savory drinks.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，那些统治帝国的人在喝到干净、香甜的饮料时却会皱起眉头。

String.Source: Take this case, replace the one in their cellar. Transform their dour drudgery into the Drink of the Divines!
String.Dest: 带上这个盒子，用它替换掉储藏间里那个。把那些无趣的劣酒变成诸神的饮品吧！

String.Source: It is then that you will cease to denigrate our cause. No, you will champion it as the vanguard in a great quest to restore the glory of Mogo's Mead!
String.Dest: 到那时候你就不会再反对我们的理由。是的，不会，而且还要像个光荣的先锋官一样支持我们，恢复莫格蜜酒的荣耀！

String.Source: It once was, and it will again, if you will lend this troubadour you ear.
String.Dest: 曾经是，未来也是，除非你要把你的耳朵借给这个游吟诗人。

String.Source: Of course not. You would inhale it lustily, and defy all those who sought to purloin it!
String.Dest: 当然不会。你会贪婪的吸它，然后赶走所有胆敢抢走它的人！

String.Source: The wolf changed its tactics from a hunter of the day; to one that chases tired beasts from their rightful prey;
String.Dest: 当时狼改变了对猎人的战术；猎人则是为了他们正直的牺牲者而追逐着那只疲倦的野兽；

String.Source: I fought the current, kicking and gulping, and in my tantrum I managed to wedge my leg between two rocks.
String.Dest: 我现在打架的时候，总是到处乱踢还吐口水。尤其是我非常生气的时候，还把自己的腿踢进了两块石头中间。

String.Source: Why, dear guest, it was not more than 20 paces from where you stand. If this answer perplexes you, allow me to recount the events that transpired.
String.Dest: 为什么，亲爱的客人，它就在距离你20步的地方。如果这个答案让你困惑，就让我重新给你说说事情的原委。

String.Source: Fret not, traveler, for it still can! We must contravene against the tyranny of honey so that all may know the glory of moon sugar!
String.Dest: 请不要烦恼，旅行者，因为你完全可以离它而去！我们必须反对蜂蜜的独裁统治，那样所有人都会知道月亮糖的美妙！

String.Source: This drew Hircine's ire, his rage and his might; for upon the wolf he cast a curse that came on moonless nights;
String.Dest: 这招致了海尔辛的不满，愤怒和力量；在没有月光的夜晚他在狼群中释放了诅咒。

String.Source: Here. A case of the finest Mogo's Mead, specially brewed for added clarity.
String.Dest: 这个，一瓶最好的莫格蜜酒，尤其是被酿造的格外清澈的这种。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: O, Olaf, our subjugator, the one-eyed betrayer; death-dealing demon...
String.Dest: 喔，奥拉夫，我们的征服者，一只眼的叛逆者；跟死亡作对的怪物...

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Hearing I ask, from the holy races, Ysgramor's sons, both high and low...
String.Dest: 听我说，不论贵贱...都是源自神圣种族的伊思格拉谟之子。

String.Source: Mortals were born and spread over Mundus, swearing fealty to the mudcrabs who presided as kings;
String.Dest: 凡人们出生并遍及于凡间, 宣誓效忠于像国王那样管理着他们的泥沼蟹。

String.Source: Of old was the age when Anu lived, earth, mountains, nor wind was there; Stars had not been, nor sky above, nor forests nor rivers nor ocean waves;
String.Dest: 在阿努还活着的那古老的过去, 这个地方没有土地，没有山脉，没有微风，也没有星辰，没有天空，没有森林，没有河流也没有海浪。

String.Source: Of old was the age when Anu lived, earth, mountains, nor wind was there; Stars had not been, nor sky above, nor forests nor rivers nor ocean waves;
String.Dest: 在阿努还活着的那古老的过去, 这个地方没有土地，没有山脉，没有微风，也没有星辰，没有天空，没有森林，没有河流也没有海浪。

String.Source: For both man and beast were pitiful creatures, too parched to speak, throats dry with no voice;
String.Dest: 人类和野兽都是可怜的生物。口干舌燥以至于张口结舌。

String.Source: An interesting proposition, gallant Urzub, but without the amulet, how would you comprehend my verse?
String.Dest: 英勇的乌祖，这真是个有趣的提议，不过没有护身符的话，你又要如何去理解我的诗？

String.Source: Alas, I cannot Urzub. Did we not agree that a cool beverage is a far better remedy?
String.Dest: 唉，我不行乌祖。不认为我们现在比起治疗来一杯冰饮更好么？

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Alone in the dark she shouted to silence and silence answered her call; When Sithis spoke the cold was warm and in the void the Gods were birthed;
String.Dest: 在孤独的幽暗中她向寂静呐喊，而寂静回应了她；当西帝斯在寒冷中注入温暖，神灵们就从虚无中诞生。

String.Source: Alone in the dark she shouted to silence and silence answered her call; When Sithis spoke the cold was warm and in the void the Gods were birthed;
String.Dest: 在孤独的幽暗中她向寂静呐喊，而寂静回应了她；当西帝斯在寒冷中注入温暖，神灵们就从虚无中诞生。

String.Source: Padomay sought to give birth to life from the nothing of nowhere; yet all Anu did was yawn, scratch and belch through each passing phase;
String.Dest: 帕瑟姆被迫从绝境中求生；而这段时间阿努只会打哈欠，挠痒，打嗝；

String.Source: Padomay sought to give birth to life from the nothing of nowhere; yet all Anu did was yawn, scratch and belch through each passing phase;
String.Dest: 帕瑟姆被迫从绝境中求生；而这段时间阿努只会打哈欠，挠痒，打嗝；

String.Source: No polishing of spears or lifting of tails, no kneading of loaves did this courtship endure;
String.Dest: 没有被抛光的矛也没有翘起的尾巴，没有揉搓的面包让这爱情持久；

String.Source: No polishing of spears or lifting of tails, no kneading of loaves did this courtship endure;
String.Dest: 没有被抛光的矛也没有翘起的尾巴，没有揉搓的面包让这爱情持久；

String.Source: Mogo's mead, Mogo's mead, The only drink we'd e'er need; Take a flask and take a seat, And drink thyself a sweety-treat!
String.Dest: 莫格蜜酒最是好，尝过你就忘不了。拿起一瓶随便坐，喝了温暖你心窝！

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: Before the birth of dragons, the mudcrabs ruled Mundus, their word was the Claw, and they spoke only by pinching.
String.Dest: 在龙出现以前，泥沼蟹统治着梦达思，它们什么都不会，只知道用钳子夹东西。

String.Source: The northern wolf ruled the earth and roamed the dense forest; Tracking game and spilling blood all for Hircine's glory.
String.Dest: 北方之狼统治了这片土地，漫步于茂密的森林；追踪猎物以及杀戮全部是为了海尔辛的荣光。

String.Source: Crantius satisfied himself without dignity or remorse, from across the farm, the animals bayed in protest.
String.Dest: 克兰蒂乌斯毫无廉耻可言，他穿过农场，就连动物都会大声抗议 。

String.Source: Drink ye merry, drink ye thirsty, Bring thy crew n'revel freely; For on one thing we're all agreed, That Mogo made the finest mead!
String.Dest: 渴了要喝酒高兴了也要喝，让你的船员都狂欢唱歌；有一件事我们都知晓啊，莫格的蜜酒最好喝！

String.Source: But the mistress stood strong. House Colto's truest protector; Her vengeance was instant, inconsolable death;
String.Dest: 可那女主人坚定不移。科尔托家族的真正守护者。她的复仇是坚决果断，斩草除根的杀戮；

String.Source: But the mistress stood strong. House Colto's truest protector; Her vengeance was instant, inconsolable death;
String.Dest: 可那女主人坚定不移。科尔托家族的真正守护者。她的复仇是坚决果断，斩草除根的杀戮；

String.Source: It hunted foxes, rabbits, chickens and all that it knew how; until the day it met the hawk perched up on a bough.
String.Dest: 它猎杀狐狸，兔子，鸡以及所有它知道如何猎杀的动物，直到某一天它看见了枝头上栖息着的鹰。

String.Source: Kyne took pity and brought mortals nightshade and moon sugar, to ferment and bottle and smoke through burnt leaf;
String.Dest: 凯恩怀着同情带来了凡人龙葵和月亮糖，通过点燃叶子来发酵、装瓶、吸食；

String.Source: The maid was not one of mortal form, for on sunlit days she grazed on the pasture.
String.Dest: 女仆不是凡人形象之一，在一个阳光明媚的日子里她在草原上放牧。

String.Source: The hawk mocked the wolf who lay exhausted from the chase; then swooped and stole the wolf's kill, leaving it in shame.
String.Dest: 老鹰嘲笑那追逐猎物疲惫不堪的狼；然后一个猛扑偷走了狼的猎物，留给它的只是耻辱。

String.Source: The wolf clenched its teeth and filled its heart with fearsome wrath; until it saw wisdom in the hawk's ventured path;
String.Dest: 狼紧咬牙齿内心充满了愤怒，直到它智慧的看到了雄鹰的冒险之路；

String.Source: O, Crantius, my spouse, my licentious betrayer, your legend is lies, lurid and false; your conquest of the maid, a con for the ages;
String.Dest: 哦，克兰蒂乌斯，我的另一半，我放荡的背叛者，你的传奇是谎言，苍白而虚伪；你征服了那个女仆，欺骗了一个时代。

String.Source: Why hello stranger whom I have never met before! I hope you are enjoying the party!
String.Dest: 你好啊陌生人！我之前从没见过你，希望你享受这个派对！

String.Source: Your fears are unwarranted Urzub. As long as I am here, our throats will never go dry.
String.Dest: 你的担心是毫无必要的，乌祖。只要我还在这里，我们就永远不会挨渴。

String.Source: Urzub, perhaps it's best we make a strategic exit.
String.Dest: 乌祖，或许我们做战略性撤退是最好的办法。

String.Source: Certainly, I hope that my recital does this piece justice. Ahem.
String.Dest: 当然，我希望能在音乐会上演奏好这首曲子。嗯哼。

String.Source: An excellent rendition! You are truly a bard worthy of passing on the tradition of the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 表演的真棒！你是个真正的吟游诗人，有资格将艾达诗歌集的传统传承下去。

String.Source: However, a discerning palate knows there is one ingredient far sweeter than honey. To the locals, it is known as Moon Sugar.
String.Dest: 然而呢，味觉敏锐的人能够辨别出里面有一种材料比蜂蜜要甜的多。当地人叫它月亮糖。

String.Source: Ahem. O, Crantius, my spouse, my licentious betrayer, your legend is lies, lurid and false; your conquest of the maid, a con for the ages;
String.Dest: 嗯哼，哦，克兰蒂乌斯，我的另一半，我放荡的背叛者，你的传奇是谎言，苍白而虚伪；你征服了那个女仆，欺骗了一个时代。

String.Source: Don't fret, my associate. The barrel is stocked and the beverages are cold.
String.Dest: 不要焦躁，我的同伴。那些酒桶被很好地储藏着，里面的酒也都是冷的。

String.Source: Mogo's mead, Mogo's mead, the only drink we'd e'er need! Take a flask and take a seat, and drink thyself a sweety-treat!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】莫戈莫戈的蜂蜜酒，莫戈莫戈的蜂蜜酒，人只要这酒就够！找个座来拿一瓶，醍醐灌顶百病走！

String.Source: Urzub, does this skeever look overcooked to you? It would not be prudent to burn the steak of our honored guest.
String.Dest: 乌祖，这玩意儿是不是烤得过了？要用烧焦的肉排来招待我们尊贵的客人不太好吧。

String.Source: And so ends the story of Crantius the liar; a deviant and a scoundrel whom we commit to the fire.
String.Dest: 那么结束骗子克兰蒂乌斯的故事吧；一个叛经离道，一个我们想把他投进火里的人的故事吧。

String.Source: Perhaps you will critique my own reciting of a similar creation verse. Ahem.
String.Dest: 搞不好你会讽刺我用如此相像的诗句来描述。呃哼。

String.Source: I knew meself a maiden fair, With em'rald eyes and fire-red hair; She owned a tavern by the sea, And served warm drinks of mellow honey!
String.Dest: 处子当垆貌无双，赤发碧眼秋波长。小村酒旗当海潮，温醅蜜酿随风香。

String.Source: For it's death and emptiness who in the end is the true father of all; and when we leave this mortal coil it's to Sithis that we return.
String.Dest: 为此最终的死亡和虚无才是一切起源；并且当我们舍弃一切尘世的牵挂时，我们才能回归西帝斯的怀抱。

String.Source: Drink ye merry, drink ye thirsty, bring thy crew 'n revel freely! For on one thing we're all agreed, that Mogo made the finest mead!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】喝个痛快，喝个大饱，让你的船员们自由狂欢吧！我们一致认为，莫戈的蜂蜜酒天下无双！

String.Source: For the pincer could clamp the flower and turn it crooked, or leave nasty welts on hides and scales;
String.Dest: 因为钳子可以夹花，让它屈身，或者留下难看的伤痕在皮和鳞上。

String.Source: The mortals were brave and unafraid of the Claw, but the mudcrabs clamped them and pinched them until they fell to their knees;
String.Dest: 英勇无畏的凡人并不惧怕巨螯，但是那些泥沼蟹挥舞着双螯，钳住、收紧，直到他们奄奄一息地跪在地上，再也无力动弹。

String.Source: Forgive my rudeness, but if you will allow me to recite a similar verse, I would be most pleased. As our guest, you may judge its worthiness.
String.Dest: 原谅我的失礼，但如果你能容许我咏诵类似的一小节，我会非常满足。作为我们的贵客，你可以裁量它的价值。

String.Source: The wolf's fur was stripped, down to the last strand; and until the moons returned, he walked the earth as a mortal man.
String.Dest: 狼的毛皮剥除了，只剩小小一条；直到月光重新照亮夜空，他就像普通人一样游荡着。

String.Source: Oh that was rather brilliant! Although traditionally in The Reach we prefer a slightly less grandiloquent reading of the Poetic Edda.
String.Dest: 哦太棒了！尽管在边陲领的传统中我们更习惯不这么夸张地朗诵艾达诗歌集。

String.Source: Run!
String.Dest: 撤！

String.Source: Urzub, I dare say, it is an opportune time for a song.
String.Dest: 乌祖，我敢说，现在正适合纵情高歌。

String.Source: Good tidings.
String.Dest: 好消息。

String.Source: I knew meself a maiden fair, with em'rald eyes and fire-red hair! She owned a tavern by the sea, and served warm drinks of mellow honey!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】少女如花正美貌，赤发碧眼秋波长！海边开家小酒馆儿，蜜酒下肚口芬香！

String.Source: They say the best mead is made from the sweetest honey.
String.Dest: 他们说最好的蜜酒是用最甜的蜂蜜酿制的。

String.Source: The wolf changed its tactics from a hunter of the day; to one that chases tired beasts from their rightful prey;
String.Dest: 当时狼改变了对猎人的战术；猎人则是为了他们正直的牺牲者而追逐着那只疲倦的野兽；

String.Source: This is a tribute to the most delectable refreshment in all of Skyrim. Mogo's Mead.
String.Dest: 这一向是天际省最佳美味。莫格蜜酒。

String.Source: This drew Hircine's ire, his rage and his might; for upon the wolf he cast a curse that came on moonless nights;
String.Dest: 这招致了海尔辛的不满，愤怒和力量；在没有月光的夜晚他在狼群中释放了诅咒。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Crantius satisfied himself without dignity or remorse, from across the farm, the animals bayed in protest.
String.Dest: 克兰蒂乌斯毫无廉耻可言，他穿过农场，就连动物都会大声抗议 。

String.Source: But the mistress stood strong. House Colto's truest protector; Her vengeance was instant, inconsolable death;
String.Dest: 可那女主人坚定不移。科尔托家族的真正守护者。她的复仇是坚决果断，斩草除根的杀戮；

String.Source: The maid was not one of mortal form, for on sunlit days she grazed on the pasture.
String.Dest: 女仆不是凡人形象之一，在一个阳光明媚的日子里她在草原上放牧。

String.Source: And so ends the story of Crantius the liar, a deviant and a scoundrel whom we commit to the fire.
String.Dest: 那么结束骗子克兰蒂乌斯的故事吧；一个叛经离道，一个我们想把他投进火里的人的故事吧。
